name: GOBLET SQUATS
details: Weights like dumbbells, rods, and barbells can be used to perform certain exercises which help you tone your body

name: Seated Chest Press
details: The chest press helps build the pectoral muscles while also working the biceps, deltoids, and latissimus dorsi.

name: Hammer Strength Machine
details: The hammer strength machine chest press is a great exercise that works on several major group of muscles in your upper body.

name: Hip Abductor Machine
details: The Hip Abductor machine is one of the many fitness equipments you will encounter at the gym.

name: Machine Lat Pulldown
details: Machine lat pulldown is another excellent strength training exercise for developing back width if you lack the upper body...

name: CHEST - Seated Pec Fly
details: First pin a suitable lifting weight then adjust the seat height so that when you take position, the arc of your arms will be just below shoulder height.
